entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
